Diamond::

Her ship finally settled on the ground near the Allience base.  The 
ships hull was torn and scortched from the entry into the earths 
atmosphere.  One wing had broken off and hit the Allience ship.  No 
damamge was done to the Allience ship, but the wing shattered and lay 
in pieces on the ground.  The main body of Diamond's ship was 
scortched and dented.  Wired were exposed and some fuel was leaking 
from the fuel tanks.  Smoke poured out of a hole in the side of the 
ship as the engine room was now on fire.  Smoke started to fill the 
interior of the ship as it sat there.  (The ship is about the size of 
te NASA space shuttle Challenger or Space shuttle Discovery)

Diamond was slumped over the console in the Captain's seat.  
Unconsious and bruised from the rough voyage, she was unaware of the 
thick black smoke that was slowly filling the bridge.
